definition: to build up an enterprise through painstaking efforts
classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
camp/barracks/battalion/to build/to operate/to manage/to strive for

sentences.english: At the end, he ground out the enormous "Biography of George Washington".
sentences.chinese: 最後，他苦心經營總算寫成卷帙浩繁的《華盛頓傳》。

sentences.english: The garment store they so painstakingly built up also ended in failure.
sentences.chinese: 他們苦心經營的服裝商店也以失敗而告終。
